body:
Fix mkl link by providing -lm and others
Should fix: #21724 

Fix using an externally installed oneapi package that is not latest. Use version number instead of 'latest' in constructing paths.

Improve documentation

Tests are running here: https://github.com/rscohn2/oneapi-spack-tests/actions/runs/698039984

FYI: @tldahlgren @scheibelp
title: [oneapi] fix mkl deps, externally installed, and docs
